description:
Provides context such as filled/focused/error/required for form inputs.
Relying on the context provides high flexibility and ensures that the state always stays
consistent across the children of the `FormControl`.
This context is used by the following components:

 - FormLabel
 - FormHelperText
 - Input
 - InputLabel

You can find one composition example below and more going to [the demos](/components/text-fields/#components).

```jsx
<FormControl>
  <InputLabel htmlFor="my-input">Email address</InputLabel>
  <Input id="my-input" aria-describedby="my-helper-text" />
  <FormHelperText id="my-helper-text">We'll never share your email.</FormHelperText>
</FormControl>
```

⚠️Only one input can be used within a FormControl.

children.description: The contents of the form control.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

disabled.description: If `true`, the label, input and helper text should be displayed in a disabled state.

error.description: If `true`, the label should be displayed in an error state.

fullWidth.description: If `true`, the component will take up the full width of its container.

hiddenLabel.description:
If `true`, the label will be hidden.
This is used to increase density for a `FilledInput`.
Be sure to add `aria-label` to the `input` element.

margin.description: If `dense` or `normal`, will adjust vertical spacing of this and contained components.

required.description: If `true`, the label will indicate that the input is required.

size.description: The size of the text field.

name: FormControl

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.marginNormal: Styles applied to the root element if `margin="normal"`.
descriptions.marginDense: Styles applied to the root element if `margin="dense"`.
descriptions.fullWidth: Styles applied to the root element if `fullWidth={true}`.
